mission_data.mission_description: The commercial sector of Xaria has five stations and many cargo ships. But a mysterious ship has just appeared! Attempt to solve the mystery in this Clue-style mystery mission! Player-selected Difficulty.

set_ship_text.name: dentripitoid
set_ship_text.desc: a strange ship resembling a biomech, can't figure anything else out.

event.name: message1
event.incoming_comms_text: hello, SS cluefinder. this is DS lounge. yes, the captain of this area is quite to fond of his mystery books.

event.name: message2
event.incoming_comms_text: shut up.

event.name: message3
event.incoming_comms_text: yes yes. we have detected a ship inside the sector, but it is not responded to any type of message we send it.^well, not with any sense. our cargo ships are to worried to go out with a creepy alien about. wait a second. our scanners sh***

event.name: message4

warning_popup_message.message: you see the ship's shape materialize into the form of a cargo carrier and teleport away.

event.incoming_comms_text: Masterfully done! though the ship escaped, our cargo carriers can now return to they're daily schedule. feel free to stay here as long as you like. for safety purposes though, we must do short range communtication for security reasons, having the mysterious ship and all. and one last thing, be careful of the nsect nests! huh. I though we only had 4 cargo ships. oh well! the more the marrier!

event.name: ship peacock
event.incoming_comms_text: study) Good day, Cluefinder. You are correct, the ship calling itself "Peacock" recently departed. The captain offended our maintenance staff by denying them access to the ship for standard resupply purposes.^

event.name: ship plum
event.incoming_comms_text: Conservatory) Yeah, Plum docked here to trade. It was weird - the captain looked Ximni, but had purple eyes. I've never heard of a purple-eyed Ximni, have you?^

event.name: ship mustard
event.incoming_comms_text: library) SS Cluefinder - Indeed, Mustard was here. Purchased large supply of high-tech security gear.^

event.name: ship scarlet
event.incoming_comms_text: study) Lovely to speak with you, Cluefinder. The ship called "Scarlet" was here recently. Very strange - passers-by at the docks reported a great deal of yelling coming from the ship, in a language that our computers didn't recognize. ^

event.name: ship green
event.incoming_comms_text: ballroom) Hullo there! Aye, we saw Green. Rumor has it that they were buying up all the torpedoes they could get. Dunna tell them I said so!^

disabled_event.name: ship 6
disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: I'm not sure about 6. they just made a preeeeetty shady deal with 2 and are now heading of for DS study.

disabled_event.name: ship 7
disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: 7 just sold some steel to 3. they are great metalworkers there, and I beleve they are heading off to DS ballroom to sell more of those goods.

disabled_event.name: ship 8
disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: 8's been pretty quiet. they're setting off for DS conservatory to get some goods from 4.

disabled_event.name: ship 9
disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: heading to rendevue with 3 at DS lounge, just picked up some furs to trade them.

disabled_event.name: ship 10
disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: 10 just sold some cetrocite crystals to 8, and is now heading off to DS library to grab some glassworks from 5.

event.name: traitor button peacock
event.incoming_comms_text: study) Good day, Cluefinder. You are correct, the ship calling itself "Peacock" recently departed. The captain offended our maintenance staff by denying them access to the ship for standard resupply purposes.^

event.name: traitor button plum
event.incoming_comms_text: Conservatory) Yeah, Plum docked here to trade. It was weird - the captain looked Ximni, but had purple eyes. I've never heard of a purple-eyed Ximni, have you?^

event.name: traitor button mustard
event.incoming_comms_text: library) SS Cluefinder - Indeed, Mustard was here. Purchased large supply of high-tech security gear.^

event.name: traitor button scarlet
event.incoming_comms_text: study) Lovely to speak with you, Cluefinder. The ship called "Scarlet" was here recently. Very strange - passers-by at the docks reported a great deal of yelling coming from the ship, in a language that our computers didn't recognize. ^

event.name: traitor button green
event.incoming_comms_text: ballroom) Hullo there! Aye, we saw Green. Rumor has it that they were buying up all the torpedoes they could get. Dunna tell them I said so!^

event.name: ship peacock
event.incoming_comms_text: ballroom) Oy, Cluefinder! You want to know about Peacock? They just left. I hear they bought some weird chemicals at one of the station shops. Wonder what that's all about?^

event.name: ship plum
event.incoming_comms_text: study) Greetings, Cluefinder. Indeed, the ship designated "Plum" recently left. My observation is that the Ximni captain requires diction lessons - he was slurring his words terribly.^

event.name: ship mustard
event.incoming_comms_text: lounge) Heya, Cluey! How's it going? Ya wanna know about Mustard? They wouldn't tell anyone what they're transporting, but there were strange noises coming from their hold and they used a ton of electricity while they were docked.^

event.name: ship scarlet
event.incoming_comms_text: conservatory) Hi again, Cluefinder! Yeah, that Scarlet ship is an odd one. One of our deck hands told me she heard some weird chanting, and when the door opened she peeked in and saw people dancing around a purple fire. What's that about?^

event.name: ship green
event.incoming_comms_text: library) SS Cluefinder, welcome. Affirmative, Green docked here. Requisitioned tauron focusers. Authorization codes passed a cursory exam, but if you're concerned we can radio their home port to verify. Should have a response in 24 hours. ^

disabled_event.name: ship 6
disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: I'm not sure about 6. they just made a preeeeetty shady deal with 2 and are now heading of for DS study.

disabled_event.name: ship 8
disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: 8's been pretty quiet. they're setting off for DS conservatory to get some goods from 4.

disabled_event.name: ship 7
disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: 7 just sold some steel to 3. they are great metalworkers there, and I beleve they are heading off to DS ballroom to sell more of those goods.

disabled_event.name: ship 9
disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: heading to rendevue with 3 at DS lounge, just picked up some furs to trade them.

disabled_event.name: ship 10
disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: 10 just sold some cetrocite crystals to 8, and is now heading off to DS library to grab some glassworks from 5.

event.name: traitor button peacock
event.incoming_comms_text: ballroom) Oy, Cluefinder! You want to know about Peacock? They just left. I hear they bought some weird electronic equipment at one of the station shops. Wonder what that's all about?^

event.name: traitor button plum
event.incoming_comms_text: Library) Greetings, Cluefinder. Indeed, the ship deisignated "Plum" recently left. I understand the the Ximni captain had dinner at our steak house. Strange, considering that Ximni cannot metabolize terran meat.^

event.name: traitor button mustard
event.incoming_comms_text: lounge) Heya, Cluey! How's it going? Ya wanna know about Mustard? They wouldn't tell anyone what they're transporting, but there was a weird purple glow coming from their hold and they used a ton of electricity while they were docked.^

event.name: traitor button scarlet
event.incoming_comms_text: conservatory) Yeah, Scarlet was here. I didn't pay much attention at the time, but then my buddy at the grocery mentioned that they ordered enough food for an army. Not field rations, but fresh food. Since cargo ships usually have a crew of half a dozen, wonder who's going to eat all that cheese?^

event.name: traitor button green
event.incoming_comms_text: library) SS Cluefinder, welcome. Affirmative, Green docked here. Requisitioned tauron focusers. Authorization codes passed a cursory exam, but if you're concerned we can radio their home port to verify. Should have a response in 24 hours. ^

event.name: ship peacock
event.incoming_comms_text: study) Cluefinder, we meet again! Indeed, Peacock is docked here. The captain admitted they refused our maintence crews previously due to embarasment about the filthy state of the ship's interior. They purchased cleaning supplies and are taking some time to straighten up.^

event.name: ship plum
event.incoming_comms_text: Ballroom) Cheers, Cluefinder! Aye, Plum was here. The capt'in got really drunk and immediately got caught cheating at the casino. The coppers ran his ID, and he's legit, if kind of a jerk. Has purple contat lenses - what a weirdo!^

event.name: ship mustard
event.incoming_comms_text: library) SS Cluefinder - affirmative, Mustard is currently docked. Entire crew can be found in the bar, celebrating their successful delivery of a load of priceless koala-kittens to an eccentric buyer.^

event.name: ship scarlet
event.incoming_comms_text: lounge) Hey there, Cluey! Oh, you wanna know about Scarlet? Yeah, I heard all this singing over the comms, so I asked them what's up and it turns out they're celebrating some obscure Arvonian religious festival. They brought me cookies!^

event.name: ship green
event.incoming_comms_text: conservatory) Yeah, Green docked here briefly. Between you and me, they met up with an undercover Terran military liason to pass off some goods they aquired. Don't ask how I know!^

disabled_event.name: ship 6
disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: I'm not sure about 6. they just made a preeeeetty shady deal with 2 and are now heading of for DS study.

disabled_event.name: ship 7
disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: 7 just sold some steel to 3. they are great metalworkers there, and I beleve they are heading off to DS ballroom to sell more of those goods.

disabled_event.name: ship 8
disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: 8's been pretty quiet. they're setting off for DS conservatory to get some goods from 4.

disabled_event.name: ship 9
disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: heading to rendevue with 3 at DS lounge, just picked up some furs to trade them.

disabled_event.name: ship 10
disabled_event.incoming_comms_text: 10 just sold some cetrocite crystals to 8, and is now heading off to DS library to grab some glassworks from 5.

event.name: traitor button peacock
event.incoming_comms_text: study) Cluefinder, we meet agiain! Indeed, Peacock currently docked here. Port authorities have mentioned some unusual high-pitched sounds and anomolous energy readings coming from the ship. They must be performing some daft science!^

event.name: traitor button plum
event.incoming_comms_text: Ballroom) Ach, aye, Plum was here. They claimed to be Ximin, but we got a high-falutin' Ximni diplomat on the station who said their verification codes were all wrong. When I called them on it, they buggered out on warp! What Ximni ship uses warp drive, I ask ye?^

event.name: traitor button mustard
event.incoming_comms_text: library) SS Cluefinder - affermative, Mustard is currently docked. There are strange noises eminating from the ship, and anomolous high energy readings. We are concerned.^

event.name: traitor button scarlet
event.incoming_comms_text: lounge) Hey Cluey, you wanna know about Scarlet? They just came by and there was some comm traffic. Let me check the recordsDecrypting now Huh, it looks like they received a schemating of Lounge station, with all the choke points marked. That's weird.^

event.name: traitor button green
event.incoming_comms_text: conservatory) Yeah, Green was here. They paid to use one of our mechanical laboratories. Don't know what they were doing in there, but they had armed guards escorting their gear to the lab and back.^

event.name: wrong back1
event.incoming_comms_text: SS CLUEFINDER! how dare you attack one of our ships!I am in no way afraid that we will have to escort you out of the sector and ask you to NEVER come by here again.

set_ship_text.name: dentripitoid
set_ship_text.desc: It is definetly attacking you, but you can't really figure out anything else.

event.name: End Mission
event.incoming_comms_text: astounding SS cluefinder! how ever did you do it? I couldn't tell the differnece between them and the others, I didn't even know anything was up! good job, once again.
